shows.title: Eat To Beat Climate Change
shows.desc:
With only 11 years left to prevent the climate crisis, what can you do to help? Discover how eating veggie food is the best way we can beat climate change. Join Sam, from the Vegetarian Society Cookery School, to learn how to make a planet-saving beetroot burger and how you can give veggie food a go.

The Vegetarian Society is a charity helping people tackle one of the most important issues facing us all today: climate change. By spreading the word about delicious veggie and vegan food, it helps all of us to do our bit for the planet.
